other_tests.findings: No dilated loops of small or large bowel; previously seen colonic distention has resolved; large stool burden in the colon; surgical clips in the left pelvis; mild thoracolumbar levoscoliosis; multilevel spinal degenerative changes; reticular opacities in the bilateral lung bases.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Resolved colonic distention; large stool burden noted.
